name: CTB6
description: CTB6(Chinese Treebank 6.0) is the latest version produced from the Chinese Treebank project, consisting of 780,000 words (over 1.28 million Chinese characters) that are segmented, part-of-speech tagged and fully bracketed. The data sources include newswire from Xinhua News Agency, articles from Sinorama Magazine, news from the website of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region and transcripts from various broadcast news programs.

models.paper_name: A Concise Model for Multi-Criteria Chinese Word Segmentation with Transformer Encoder
Subword Encoding in Lattice LSTM for Chinese Word Segmentation
Fast and Accurate Neural Word Segmentation for Chinese

models.paper_link: Long Short-Term Memory Neural Networks for Chinese Word Segmentation

models.paper_name: Neural Word Segmentation Learning for Chinese
